mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.class_id AS "gClass.id", sgc.name AS "gClass.name", sg.id AS "gener.id", sg.name AS "gener.name", a.type AS "type", a.name AS "name", a.title AS "title", a.price AS "price", a.market_price AS "marketPrice", a.cost_price AS "costPrice", a.spec_ids AS "specIds", a.goods_stock AS "goodsStock", a.item_num AS "itemNum", a.image AS "image", a.images AS "images", a.bands_id AS "bandsId", a.supplier_id AS "supplierId", a.goods_desc AS "goodsDesc", a.publish AS "publish", a.recommend AS "recommend", a.keywords AS "keywords", a.sort AS "sort", a.remarks AS "remarks", a.create_by AS "createBy.id", a.create_date AS "createDate", a.update_by AS "updateBy.id", a.update_date AS "updateDate", a.del_flag AS "delFlag"
LEFT JOIN s_goods_class sgc ON sgc.id=a.class_id LEFT JOIN s_genre sg ON sg.id=sgc.genre_id
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO s_goods( id, class_id, gener_id, type, name, title, price, market_price, cost_price, spec_ids, goods_stock, item_num, image, images, bands_id, supplier_id, goods_desc, publish, recommend, keywords, sort, remarks, create_by, create_date, update_by, update_date, del_flag ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{gClass.id}, #{gener.id}, #{type}, #{name}, #{title}, #{price}, #{marketPrice}, #{costPrice}, #{specIds}, #{goodsStock}, #{itemNum}, #{image}, #{images}, #{bandsId}, #{supplierId}, #{goodsDesc}, #{publish}, #{recommend}, #{keywords}, #{sort}, #{remarks}, #{createBy.id}, #{createDate}, #{updateBy.id}, #{updateDate}, #{delFlag} )
mapper.update: UPDATE s_goods SET class_id = #{gClass.id}, gener_id = #{gener.id}, type = #{type}, name = #{name}, title = #{title}, price = #{price}, market_price = #{marketPrice}, cost_price = #{costPrice}, spec_ids = #{specIds}, goods_stock = #{goodsStock}, item_num = #{itemNum}, image = #{image}, images = #{images}, bands_id = #{bandsId}, supplier_id = #{supplierId}, goods_desc = #{goodsDesc}, publish = #{publish}, recommend = #{recommend}, keywords = #{keywords}, sort = #{sort}, remarks = #{remarks}, update_by = #{updateBy.id}, update_date = #{updateDate} WHERE id = #{id}
